entry.title: Prince-chidi/shorthand.js: Shorthand.js is a lightweight, open-source JavaScript library created to reduce repetitive, verbose DOM manipulation Javascript codes and Prototypes, by offering short, intuitive functions. Instead of long vanilla JS code, you write cleaner, more readable one-liners using $$ or sh prefixes.
entry.content: Shorthand.js is a lightweight, open-source JavaScript library created to reduce repetitive, verbose DOM manipulation Javascript codes and Prototypes, by offering short, intuitive functions. Instead of long vanilla JS code, you write cleaner, more readable one-liners using $$ or sh prefixes.

entry.title: letmaker/liko: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript. Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI. Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.
entry.content: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript. Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI. Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.

entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
